Erfahrung mit NLP (Natural Language Processing) und Wissensextraktion
Kenntnisse und Interesse an Machine-Learning-Methoden zur Annotation und Wissensextraktion
Allgemeines Verst√§ndnis des Bereichs Wissenschaft, Technologie und Innovation sowie Erfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit mit politischen Entscheidungstr√§gern und Kenntnisse im Umgang mit wirtschaftlichen und innovationsbezogenen Daten

Unser Angebot


Wir bieten durch die enge Projektzusammenarbeit mit √∂ffentlichen Institutionen ein sinnstiftendes und gesellschaftlich wirkungsvolles Arbeitsumfeld

Wir erm√∂glichen eine flexible Arbeitsweise (reduzierte Stundenzahl, Gleitzeit) mit attraktiven Arbeitspl√§tzen in unseren B√ºros in Berlin oder Frankfurt/M. sowie Home-Office-M√∂glichkeiten durch mobilf√§hige Ausstattung (MacBook & iPhone)
Wir legen Wert auf eine angenehme Arbeitsatmosph√§re und leben dies z.B. durch regelm√§√üige Teamevents, inkl. Events aller Kolleg*innen der Technopolis-B√ºros weltweit. Wir pflegen intensiv den Austausch mit unseren Schwesterb√ºros in Europa, Afrika und Lateinamerika
Technopolis ist ausschlie√ülich in Besitz der Mitarbeitenden, externe Investoren gibt es bei uns nicht. Perspektivisch k√∂nnen alle Mitarbeitende Anteilseigner*innen der Technopolis Group werden. Unabh√§ngig hiervon partizipiert unser gesamtes Team regelm√§√üig am Unternehmenserfolg
Wir bieten eine unbefristete Anstellung in einem wachsenden Unternehmen. Zusch√ºsse zur Nutzung umweltfreundlicher Mobilit√§tsarten (√ñPNV oder Jobrad), f√ºr eine Urban Sports Club-Mitgliedschaft sowie die betriebliche Altersversorgung runden das Angebot ab

Auch wenn Sie nicht alle Anforderungen komplett erf√ºllen, bewerben Sie sich gerne. Vielleicht sind genau Sie die richtige Person f√ºr uns. Wir wertsch√§tzen Vielfalt und begr√º√üen daher alle Bewerbungen ‚Äì unabh√§ngig von Geschlecht, Nationalit√§t, ethnischer und sozialer Herkunft, Religion/Weltanschauung, Behinderung, Alter sowie sexueller Orientierung und Identit√§t.

F√ºr Fragen wenden Sie sich bitte an unsere Recruiting Managerin Susann Reinsch (susann.reinsch_AT_technopolis-group.com).

Bewerbungsschluss ist der 25. Mai 2025. Bewerbungsgespr√§che k√∂nnen bereits vor Bewerbungsschluss gef√ºhrt werden.

Title: Associate Research Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
We‚Äôre looking for an Associate Research Scientist to help us accomplish our mission to improve and extend lives by learning from the experience of every person with cancer. Are you ready to be the next changemaker in cancer care?

Flatiron Health is a healthtech company using data for good to power smarter care for every person with cancer, around the world. Flatiron partners with cancer centers in the US, Europe and Asia to transform patients‚Äô real-life experiences into real-world evidence and create a more modern, connected oncology ecosystem. Our multidisciplinary teams include oncologists, data scientists, software engineers, epidemiologists, product experts and more. Flatiron Health is an independent affiliate of the Roche Group.

What You'll Do

In this role, you will work as a member of the Research Sciences (RS) department, primarily supporting our work in the UK, Germany, and Japan. This team provides customized real-world data and real-world evidence solutions to address the most important research questions across clinical development, market access, and commercial use cases for our life sciences partners.

In this role, you will:



Develop subject matter expertise in real-world oncology data to support data product development and evidence generation.
Design and conduct in-depth analyses to assess data quality and fitness-for-use for real-world evidence generation in the international markets.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including epidemiologists, data scientists, and oncologists, to refine methodologies and ensure rigorous study execution.
Implement statistical analyses by translating analytic specifications from a statistical analysis plan into R code to generate descriptive and inferential statistics and develop visualizations.
Contribute to external scientific publications, including manuscripts and conference abstracts, to advance the field of oncology real-world evidence.
Stay current with epidemiological and statistical methodologies for analyzing observational real-world data and deepen expertise in cancer biology, therapies, and outcomes across multiple tumor types.



Who You Are

You're a kind, passionate and collaborative problem-solver who values the opportunity to think beyond the way things are. In addition, you‚Äôre an analytical thinker and excellent communicator with experience or interest in supporting design and execution of real-world studies that support use cases across the oncology product development life cycle. You are excited by the prospect of rolling up your sleeves to tackle meaningful problems each and every day. Additionally:



You hold a Master‚Äôs degree in Epidemiology, Biostatistics, Health Economics and Outcomes Research, Health Policy (or closely related field) with 2 - 3 years of relevant professional experience, or a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in one of those fields with 4-5 years of relevant professional experience
You have experience working in a pharmaceutical, HEOR consulting, healthcare analytics, or academic research environment
You have experience with observational datasets (e.g., registries, healthcare claims, or electronic health records)
You‚Äôre proficient at coding in R
You have strong communication skills, with experience contributing to study documentation
You have effective organizational, time-management, and prioritization and skills necessary to contribute to multiple high-visibility projects in a timely fashion
You have an agile mindset and adapt quickly to changes in project direction
You are able to quickly learn and apply new information, skills and procedures
You are passionate about our mission to improve healthcare through technology
You are proficient in English and German



Optional



You have oncology experience



Who We Are

Our people are at the centre of everything we do. We strive to foster a culture where our teammates feel equipped and empowered to make meaningful contributions with confidence, compassion, and clarity.
Show more

Title: Senior Data Scientist - (Logistics, Workforce)
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist - (Logistics, Workforce) to join our Logistics team to help us create a fast, reliable and transparent delivery experience. You will make an impact in optimizing our on-demand last-mile delivery operations, involving hundreds of thousands of couriers and restaurants, improving the experience for millions orders per day in 70+ countries.


Conceptualize the right modeling approach for challenges in the field of Logistics at scale, together with your squad lead and our stakeholders.
Innovate new modeling solutions by drawing from fields like Machine Learning, Operations Research and Statistics that drive value for our business.
Pair-program with your squad to engineer solutions that automate the retraining of models and generation of predictions.
Provide ideas in brainstorming sessions with your Data Science colleagues to solve the toughest modeling problems together.
Help defining data needs to bring value to the projects and collaborate with the data engineering as well as with the tech teams in planning their roadmap.
Work with (semi-)structured data from our BigQuery DWH architecture and process with Spark where necessary.
Contribute and make an impact in a global, fast-moving tech organization.
Have fun and grow together with your team.


In our Logistics Team, you‚Äôll tackle high-impact challenges that make last-mile delivery efficient, affordable, and sustainable. Your work will directly improve experiences for riders, end customers, and merchants across the globe. Each enhancement you contribute will help Delivery Hero optimize delivery operations, supporting expansion into new areas like grocery and retail.

What you need to be successful


You have at least 3 years of experience applying methods from machine learning to real-world datasets.
Fluency in Python and familiarity with its scientific/visualization libraries such as Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Plotly etc.
You can transfer business problems from a problem space to a technical solution space.
Experience in solving regression and classification type of problems with statistical, linear/non-linear models and ensemble models in particular (Random Forest/XGBoost/LightGBM/CatBoost).
Experience with Time-Series Forecasting, Operations Research, and Statistics is an interesting addition.
You know how to work with Big Data platforms such as Big Query/Spark and know how to write a SQL query to pull the data you need.
You can write maintainable code that follows best practices in software engineering.
Before starting to work on a use-case, you carefully challenge existing assumptions and care about clean data.
You are a strong communicator and can explain the intuition behind your modeling approach to people with different backgrounds.
You love to learn and you are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from different tech teams in a diverse environment.


Who we are

As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Research Engineering Intern
Description:
Deep learning has only just started its transformative impact on the natural sciences. In Microsoft Research AI for Science we are seeking to solve some of the fundamental challenges in the molecular sciences with deep learning.

We are seeking a highly motivated Research Engineering Intern. The ideal candidate will have an understanding of machine learning and/or language modelling fundamentals, and will work on language modelling within the context of natural sciences.

Responsibilities


Architect, design, and implement scalable and robust solutions for machine learning and scientific research involving large volumes of heterogeneous data.
Build and optimize distributed data processing and model building pipelines.
Develop and maintain tools and technologies for building, training, optimizing, scaling machine learning solutions


Qualifications

Required/Minimum Qualifications:‚ÄØ‚ÄØ


Working towards a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master's degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science, Physics, Engineering, Chemistry, Mathematics or a related field.
Strong familiarity with Linux and the open-source ecosystem
Experience with scientific computing


Preferred/Additional Qualifications


Experience with cloud computing or HPC is a plus
Experience with language modelling is a plus


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: Data Science Manager
Description:
Interested in leading data-driven innovation while working in a collaborative, high-impact environment? Passionate about machine learning, big data, and predictive modeling?




We‚Äôve partnered with a fast-growing tech company that is looking for a highly experienced Data Scientist to drive data strategy, machine learning implementation, and data product development across the org. This role offers the opportunity to work on large-scale data solutions, mentor a growing team, and establish best practices in data science and analytics.




What You‚Äôll Be Working On:

Driving data science and analytics strategy, fostering collaboration and best practices across the Data chapter
Improving existing data analysis and reporting structures
Designing and optimizing data pipelines with tools like Apache Airflow, DAGster, and DBT
Working with large datasets to enhance product performance and decision-making
Establishing best practices for cost-effective, scalable data solutions
Mentoring and guiding data analysts and scientists within the organization




Ideal Experience:

Proven industry experience in big data, data warehousing, and data products
Relevant background in LLMs, NLP, and predictive modeling (preferred)
Hands-on experience with SQL, Python, Spark, DuckDB, Snowflake, and Metabase
Expertise in building scalable data pipelines and working with large datasets
Knowledge of servant leadership principles in autonomous product team environments




Other Important Details:

Hybrid role based in Berlin
Competitive salary and benefits package
30 vacation days & remote work flexibility
Company pension, wellness programs, and professional development opportunities




This is an opportunity to lead and shape the future of data science within a forward-thinking company. If you're interested or want to know more, click Apply or reach out to Ionut Roghina for more details.

Title: SoftwareArchitekt
Description:
SoftwareArchitekt bei Inno-focus digital gmbh

Anforderungen

Wohnsitz: Nur f√ºr Bewerber aus Deutschland, √ñsterreich und der Schweiz

Sprache: Deutsch - Muttersprachliches Niveau

Du hast Dein Studium der Informatik mit einem Master abgeschlossen.

Seit mindestens sechs Jahren arbeitest Du als Softwarearchitekt und Lead-Softwareentwickler an komplexen Systemen, zum Beispiel an einem ERP-System. In dieser Zeit hast Du Dir fundierte Kenntnisse in der Datenmodellierung, der Abbildung von Business-Logik und in der Entwicklung von Code-Generatoren angeeignet.

Du verf√ºgst √ºber mehrj√§hrige Erfahrung in der Programmierung im .NET-Umfeld (C#, C++), setzt Angular gezielt ein und arbeitest routiniert in agilen Entwicklungsteams.

Du kannst sowohl externe als auch interne Entwickler sicher anleiten.

Du arbeitest Dich schnell in komplexe Sachverhalte ein und hast Freude daran, Modelle zu entwickeln, die sich in Software umsetzen lassen.

Deine didaktischen F√§higkeiten sind stark ausgepr√§gt und Du kannst Dich gut auf das jeweilige Know-how Deiner Kolleginnen und Kollegen einstellen.

T√§tigkeiten

Du √ºbernimmst die Rolle Software Architekt und Lead-Software-Entwickler f√ºr ein komplexes Handels- und Logistik System. Das System deckt alle Gesch√§ftsvorf√§lle f√ºr den station√§ren Handel und den Online-Handel ab. Dies umfasst sowohl Sachg√ºter als auch Dienstleistungen und deren Kombinationen. Das System ist als Multi-Channel-System in den Lieferketten und im Absatz an verschiedene digitale Plattformen eingebunden. Das Business ist B2C und B2B.

Team

Du wirst in einem Entwicklungsteam arbeiten, in dem Deine Kollegen, externe Entwickler und die Mitarbeiter des Kunden vertreten sind. Wir organisieren unsere Aufgabenstellungen √ºber agile Methoden komplett agil, so dass Du Deinen Arbeitsort frei w√§hlen kannst. Neben den digitalen Meeting Formaten treffen wir uns auch im Rahmen von Veranstaltungen f√ºr die Fort- und Weiterbildungen pers√∂nlich in Berlin oder an einer coolen "Location".

√úber das Unternehmen

Seit 20 Jahren ber√§t und unterst√ºtzt inno-focus f√ºhrende Unternehmen, Regierungsorganisationen, Vereine und Cluster bei der Entwicklung von Innovationsstrategien, der Implementierung von Innovationsmanagement sowie bei der Umsetzung von Innovationsprojekten.

F√ºr die Entwicklung erfolgreicher Innovationsstrategien bedarf es verst√§rkt eines dynamischen Zusammenspiels unterschiedlichster Akteure. Daher liegt ein weiterer Schwerpunkt der inno-focus darauf, Innovationsnetzwerke zu etablieren. √úber diese Arbeit hat sich inno-focus in den vergangenen Jahren zu einem international anerkannten Spezialisten f√ºr Open und Cross Innovation sowie Crowdsourcing entwickelt.

Beispielsweise wurde 2004 das Innovationsnetzwerk ‚ÄûInnovation Excellence Netzwerk‚Äú gegr√ºndet, welches neben einer Vielzahl namhafter Unternehmen auch Vertreter aus Wissenschaft, Forschung und Politik umfasst.Seit 2010 ber√§t Cluster bei der der Strategieentwicklung sowie dem operativen Cluster-Management. F√ºr das Management der Innovation-√ñkosystem von Clustern hat inno-focus die Innovation Plattform innoecos entwickelt. innoecos liefert Clustern und Unternehmen eine Plattform, um Innovationsnetzwerke aufzubauen und zu managen.

Klicke auf "Bewerben" f√ºr Details zu den Benefits, dem Team und dem Bewerbungsprozess.

Wir organisieren unsere Aufgabenstellungen √ºber agile Methoden komplett agil, so dass Du Deinen Arbeitsort frei w√§hlen kannst. Neben den digitalen Meeting Formaten treffen wir uns auch im Rahmen von Veranstaltungen f√ºr die Fort- und Weiterbildungen pers√∂nlich in Berlin oder an einer coolen "Location".

√úber das Unternehmen

Seit 20 Jahren ber√§t und unterst√ºtzt inno-focus f√ºhrende Unternehmen, Regierungsorganisationen, Vereine und Cluster bei der Entwicklung von Innovationsstrategien, der Implementierung von Innovationsmanagement sowie bei der Umsetzung von Innovationsprojekten.

F√ºr die Entwicklung erfolgreicher Innovationsstrategien bedarf es verst√§rkt eines dynamischen Zusammenspiels unterschiedlichster Akteure. Daher liegt ein weiterer Schwerpunkt der inno-focus darauf, Innovationsnetzwerke zu etablieren. √úber diese Arbeit hat sich inno-focus in den vergangenen Jahren zu einem international anerkannten Spezialisten f√ºr Open und Cross Innovation sowie Crowdsourcing entwickelt.

Beispielsweise wurde 2004 das Innovationsnetzwerk ‚ÄûInnovation Excellence Netzwerk‚Äú gegr√ºndet, welches neben einer Vielzahl namhafter Unternehmen auch Vertreter aus Wissenschaft, Forschung und Politik umfasst.Seit 2010 ber√§t Cluster bei der der Strategieentwicklung sowie dem operativen Cluster-Management. F√ºr das Management der Innovation-√ñkosystem von Clustern hat inno-focus die Innovation Plattform innoecos entwickelt. innoecos liefert Clustern und Unternehmen eine Plattform, um Innovationsnetzwerke aufzubauen und zu managen.

Klicke auf "Bewerben" f√ºr Details zu den Benefits, dem Team und dem Bewerbungsprozess.

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Growth Analytics
Description:
About Moloco:

Moloco is a machine learning company empowering organizations of all sizes to grow and unlock the full value of their unique first-party data, elevating the traditional path to performance advertising. While the largest technology companies have proven the speed and scale of ad-targeting utilizing data‚Äî the same robust performance powered by machine learning has previously been unavailable beyond their platforms.

That's where Moloco steps in. With Moloco's powerful combination of cutting-edge machine learning technologies, we play a unique and visible role in shaping the digital economy, all while allowing companies to stay independent and scale.

An industry leader at the nexus of machine learning, performance marketing, and visionary product infrastructure, Moloco is advancing the advertising technology industry. We ranked in the top 10% of the Inc. 5000 fastest-growing private companies for 2023. Recognized as one of 46 leading Cloud Computing companies, receiving the Stratus Award for 2023. In 2023, we received Google‚Äôs Cloud DevOps Dreamers Award, a recognition given to companies that are implementing DevOps practices to drive organizational success and high performance. Lastly, Moloco is a 2024-certified Great Place to Work! Check us out on Glassdoor and be sure to get an inside look at working at Moloco on Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.

Moloco is headquartered in Silicon Valley, with offices in San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles, Seattle, London, Berlin, Seoul, Singapore, Beijing, Gurgaon, Bangalore, Tel Aviv and Tokyo.

Creating a diverse workforce and a culture of inclusion and belonging is core to our existence. To reach our goals, diversity of talent and thought is a critical component of how we operate as an organization. Our workforce is our superpower, and we know that fostering a culture of inclusion, authenticity, and belonging will allow us the greatest opportunity to carry out our mission -- to empower businesses of all sizes to grow through operational machine learning.

Moloco is a truly rewarding place to work and in an exciting period of growth, which you could be a part of. Join us today and apply now!

The Impact You'll Be Contributing to Moloco:

Data Science and Analytics (DSA) is a global team of data scientists. As a Senior Data Scientist, Growth Analytics you will provide data products, e.g. raw data, campaign facts, growth insights to help customers improve campaign performance and maximize their business goals with Moloco.

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll be working on:

Moloco Data Scientists contribute in the following areas, all while working cross-functionally to help meet our client‚Äôs needs and advance our machine learning models.


Data Analysis: data gathering, analysis and effective communication of presentations and recommendations to multiple levels of stakeholders. You‚Äôll be responsible for creating custom visual displays of quantitative information through writing queries, scripts, and developing automated reports and dashboards to provide insights at scale.
Data validation: verifying the data we obtain from ad exchanges and mobile-app tracking solutions to confirm our campaign models are trained with the most accurate engagement data.
Campaign optimization: engaging in the life cycle of campaigns, from monitoring daily performance to partnering with sales teams on bespoke analysis for clients.
Business Collaboration: collaborate with key stakeholders to help Moloco focus on decisions that improve our products and services, with a focus on client growth.


How Will You Know if the Role is Right For You?

Minimum Requirements:


Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field with 7+ years work experience in data analytics using statistical packages (e.g., R, Python, SAS, Stata, MATLAB, SQL).
OR a Master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field with 5+ years data analytics work experience using statistical packages.
OR a PhD in a quantitative field with 3+ data analytics work experience using statistical packages.
Programming: working knowledge of Python (or R) and SQL is required.
Statistics: must have strong knowledge and experience in experimental design, hypothesis testing, and various statistical analysis such as regression or time-series analysis.
Comfortable balancing multiple projects simultaneously and effectively prioritizing work based on business needs.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with ability to present information and analysis results effectively to technical and less technical stakeholders.
Ability to build positive relationships within data science & analytics community, as well as with our business stakeholders and clients.
Work effectively with cross-functional and cross-cultural partners.
Have an interest in data, metrics, analysis, and trends from the mindset of helping a customer-centric business. Know when to apply statistical measurement vs 80-20 analysis for business growth.


Preferred:


Master's degree in a quantitative field (e.g., Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Data Sciences).
Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time while paying attention to detail.
Distinctive problem-solving skills, good at articulating product questions, pulling data from large datasets and using statistics to arrive at a recommendation.
Proven ability to own projects end-to-end, even when you have to get creative: you do more than completing delegated tasks.
Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.
Ability to seek out new business questions and effectively scope projects to support client growth, reengagement and overall campaign strategy and performance.


Moloco Thrive: Benefits and Well-Being:

We take care of you and create the conditions for you to do the best work of your career. Through a lens of inclusion, we offer innovative benefits that empower our employees to take care of themselves and their families so they can do the best work of their lives. For an overview of our global benefits, click here.

Moloco Values


Lead with Humility: Everyone‚Äôs voice is respected, valued, and heard. With humility, we become more open and accessible to each other. We win, lose, and learn together. Accountability and feedback are essential to our success.
Uncapped Growth Mindset: We see all situations as opportunities to learn, grow, and improve as individuals and as an organization. We seek diverse perspectives, encourage curiosity, and promote experimentation to push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible.
Create Real Value: We pursue the most impactful opportunities with rigor and integrity. We take intelligent risks and make disciplined trade-offs to maintain deep focus. We help our customers win by delivering durable value.
Go Further Together: We‚Äôre one team working towards one mission and vision. We collaborate proactively and inclusively, involving the right people at the right time and in the right way. We strive to create a more equitable workplace. We won‚Äôt let each other fail.


Additional Resources:


Moloco Company Blog
Moloco Leadership
Moloco Newsroom


Equal Opportunity:

Moloco is an equal opportunity employer. As we highly value diversity in our current and future employees, we do not discriminate (including in our hiring and promotion practices) on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, sex and gender, gender expression, and gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, military and veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Candidate Privacy Notice:

Your privacy matters to us. By applying, you acknowledge that you‚Äôve reviewed our Candidate Privacy Notice.
Show more

Title: Applied Scientist (Forecasting)- Markets (All Genders)
Description:
APPLIED SCIENTIST (FORECASTING) - MARKETS (ALL GENDERS)




THE ROLE & THE TEAM

As Applied Scientist (Forecasting) in the Markets organization, you will work in the Applied Science Forecasting team working with exceptional Applied Scientists to create bold research experiments with today's most exciting State-of-the-Art approaches in the scientific field. You will be contributing to the team developing cutting-edge forecasting solutions that will support the steering of Zalando‚Äôs $10Bn+ Business.

You will take the responsibility of developing machine learning solutions for our multiple KPI, timescale and time granularity forecasting problems. You will empower the team to stay up-to-date with the latest research in Forecasting Science for Demand Planning (e.g. forecasting market demand, logistics KPIs, etc). You will provide egoless and constructive scientific feedback to peers to become great researchers.




WHAT WE‚ÄôD LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)

You will be a senior contributor in our Applied Science team
Take the ownership in planning, developing, and monitoring the scientific solutions addressing the business problems of our stakeholders
Rigorous approach in solving, conducting, and documenting research projects
Good communication skills to translate (even complex) analytical / engineering decisions and outcomes to broader, non-technical audience
Work closely with ML engineers, applied scientists, and product team members in demand forecasting domain to bring our state of the art solutions to customers
Raise the scientific bar across your team and Zalando through publications in prestigious international conferences, and engaging in rigorous peer reviews. Actively collaborate with other teams and share knowledge and expertise within our talented applied science community.




WE‚ÄôD LOVE TO MEET YOU IF YOU HAVE

Strong academic background in a STEM field or equivalent
Strong experience in Demand Forecasting science
Strong problem solving skills for Data Science
Experience in demand forecasting science related projects (e.g. full lifecycle of deep learning forecasting)
Experience in translating research into application with a good balance between scientific rigour and sustained relevance.
Experience or knowledge in causal machine learning
Strong Experience with Python in applied context - experience with ML frameworks (Pytorch, tensorflow, etc) applied for forecasting problems
Fluent business English.
Self-driven, intrinsic motivation for result implementation (action orientation).
Good to have: Familiarity with machine learning infrastructure and tooling, such as Databricks, Spark, relational databases, AWS SageMaker, S3, EC2, Step Functions, Git




OUR OFFER

Zalando provides a range of benefits, here‚Äôs an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer

Employee shares program
40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
2 paid volunteering days a year
Hybrid working model with 60% (or more) remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
27 days of vacation a year (for Zalando SE)
Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
Family services, including counseling and support
Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
Mental health support and coaching available




INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN

At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy:

https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups:

https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Campaigns
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Data Scientist to help us improve Bolt‚Äôs Campaigns

About Us

Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa, with over 150 million customers in 50+ countries. We‚Äôre a global team of more than 100 nationalities joined on a common mission ‚Äì to make cities for people, not cars. And we need you to make it happen!

About The Role

You will be building models for predicting the probability of the user booking under specific circumstances. You will work on customer segmentation: discover rider, driver, and eater segments for efficient campaign targeting. As a Data Scientist, you will be developing a system for automating promo campaigns setup and scaling it for millions of Bolt customers. You will be engaged in designing optimal experimental setup for comparing different campaigns targeting methodologies and user behavior dynamics. You will work on prioritising user acquisition channels using analytical and machine learning approaches.

Your daily adventures will include:


Machine learning and statistical model development and its deployment into a production environment)
Studying historical user behaviour and building models for optimal users‚Äô discount allocation
Developing a system for automating regular promo campaign setups)
Setting up A/B tests, collecting, interpreting its results, and communicating to stakeholders)
Working with a technical stack consisting of Python, Docker, Presto, SageMaker, Airflow)
Collaborating with data analysts, data scientists, product managers, and software engineers in feature teams )



About you:


Industry experience in data science and machine learning (4+ years recommended), with deep knowledge of statistics, probability, and causal inference
Proficient in setting A/B tests and interpreting results, with a strong understanding of statistical hypothesis testing
Track record of deploying models to production and effectively measuring their impact
Experience in writing complex SQL queries and mapping business/product problems to data science frameworks
Strong product thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to communicate, persuade, and collaborate effectively
Proactive, self-driven mindset, able to take initiative with minimal supervision and work well in a team



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don‚Äôt tick every box, please consider applying if you feel you‚Äôre the kind of person described above!

Why you‚Äôll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode with a minimum of 2 days in the office each week to foster strong connections and teamwork.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location and role.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist - Consumer (Global Discovery)
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Data Scientist to join the Search & Ranking team within consumer discovery on our journey to always deliver amazing experiences.


Develop and Optimize Search Algorithms: Enhance and research new search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization, to deliver the most relevant results to our users.
Collaborate Across Teams: Work as part of a cross-functional team, including Backend Engineers, Product Managers, and Data Engineers, to improve our global search end-2-end.
Analyze and interpret large datasets: Extract meaningful insights to understand relevance problems.
Innovate and Experiment: Identify and apply the best machine learning and statistical methods to solve complex problems, ensuring solutions are scalable and effective in production environments.
Navigate Ambiguity: Define and tackle data science problems amidst ambiguity, ensuring clear problem definitions and actionable insights


At Delivery Hero, you‚Äôll shape the global consumer experience for millions of users. Your work will have a direct impact on how we attract and retain customers, creating data-driven, personalized interactions that keep them coming back. As part of our Consumer Team, you‚Äôll enhance customer satisfaction and drive global growth and profitability through innovative projects.

What you need to be successful


Experience: Master‚Äôs degree (or Bachelor‚Äôs with 4+ years of work experience) in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Theoretical Chemistry, or similar. 2+ years of experience as a data scientist working on applying data science fundamentals to solve complex business problems
Technical Expertise: Proficiency in SQL and Python and its ML ecosystem is essential. Experience with Java and Scala is a plus.
Machine Learning Knowledge: Strong understanding of a wide variety of ML and statistical methods, including Classical ML, Deep Learning, NLP, and Recommendation Systems. Ability to discern the most suitable approach for different problems.
Search and Ranking ML Algorithms: Hands-on experience with search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization.
Problem-Solving: Comfortable with ambiguity and capable of navigating it to define clear data science problems and solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on delivering practical solutions.
Collaborative Spirit: Proven experience working in cross-functional teams, contributing effectively to joint projects and achieving common goals. Excellent communication skills to articulate complex ideas and influence stakeholders.


Who we are

As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

HTML:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Data Scientist to join the Search & Ranking team within consumer discovery on our journey to always deliver amazing experiences.

  • Develop and Optimize Search Algorithms: Enhance and research new search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization, to deliver the most relevant results to our users.
  • Collaborate Across Teams: Work as part of a cross-functional team, including Backend Engineers, Product Managers, and Data Engineers, to improve our global search end-2-end.
  • Analyze and interpret large datasets: Extract meaningful insights to understand relevance problems.
  • Innovate and Experiment: Identify and apply the best machine learning and statistical methods to solve complex problems, ensuring solutions are scalable and effective in production environments.
  • Navigate Ambiguity: Define and tackle data science problems amidst ambiguity, ensuring clear problem definitions and actionable insights

At Delivery Hero, you‚Äôll shape the global consumer experience for millions of users. Your work will have a direct impact on how we attract and retain customers, creating data-driven, personalized interactions that keep them coming back. As part of our Consumer Team, you‚Äôll enhance customer satisfaction and drive global growth and profitability through innovative projects.

What you need to be successful

  • Experience: Master‚Äôs degree (or Bachelor‚Äôs with 4+ years of work experience) in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Theoretical Chemistry, or similar. 2+ years of experience as a data scientist working on applying data science fundamentals to solve complex business problems
  • Technical Expertise: Proficiency in SQL and Python and its ML ecosystem is essential. Experience with Java and Scala is a plus.
  • Machine Learning Knowledge: Strong understanding of a wide variety of ML and statistical methods, including Classical ML, Deep Learning, NLP, and Recommendation Systems. Ability to discern the most suitable approach for different problems.
  • Search and Ranking ML Algorithms: Hands-on experience with search machine learning algorithms, such as learning to rank, semantic search, and personalization.
  • Problem-Solving: Comfortable with ambiguity and capable of navigating it to define clear data science problems and solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on delivering practical solutions.
  • Collaborative Spirit: Proven experience working in cross-functional teams, contributing effectively to joint projects and achieving common goals. Excellent communication skills to articulate complex ideas and influence stakeholders.

Who we are

As the world‚Äôs pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe‚Äôs largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you‚Äôre in good shape, then we‚Äôre in good shape.

  • Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
  • We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
  • We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 ‚Ç¨ Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
  • Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
  • Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we‚Äôll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
  • The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.

Ready to join our team? If you‚Äôre excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world‚Äôs leading delivery platform, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience‚Äîjust include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Junior AI Solutions Engineer
Description:
Lovehoney Group is the world‚Äôs leading sexual wellbeing company, with the mission to elevate pleasure through innovative technologies, a data-driven approach, and foster creative and fresh perspectives on intimacy. We offer exciting brands with innovative, high-quality sex toys, lingerie, and accessories in a streamlined online shopping experience.

At Lovehoney, we employ over 800 passionate and progressive individuals across 9 global offices, each person contributing a unique blend of talents to our diverse workforce. We are proud to be a company that thrives by doing things differently, challenging expectations and stereotypes while making a positive impact on our customers‚Äô lives.

Join us at Lovehoney, where pleasure combines with creativity, data, and innovation!

We are currently looking for a Junior ML Scientist who will be integral to driving high-level performance across Lovehoney Group. Partnering directly with the Head of AI, your focus will be on developing AI Applications. In this role, you will combine your appreciation for Technology with your capacity for creative AI Solutions. You will develop skills crucial to advancing in a competitive, fast-paced retail sector, all within a company that prizes dedication and results.

What You Will Do


Craft Next-Level AI Solutions



Design, build, and optimise advanced LLM pipelines, emphasizing prompt engineering and chain-of-thought methodologies.

Actively research, prototype, and integrate new techniques to enhance LLM performance across real-world use cases.


Automate Business Processes



Develop automated workflows and AI agents using n8n.io (or similar platforms like Make), streamlining and optimizing key business processes.

Efficiently automate routine tasks, creating practical and reliable solutions that save time and resources.


AI Applications



Move swiftly from prototypes to tangible AI products, ensuring your work has immediate, measurable impact on business operations and customer experiences.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to manage AI project lifecycles from concept to deployment, demonstrating strong project management skills.

What You Should Bring


Python & ML Framework Proficiency



Excellent programming skills in Python.

Hands-on experience with popular machine learning frameworks, especially LangChain or LlamaIndex.


AI-Assisted Coding



Practical experience with AI-enhanced IDEs‚Äîparticularly Cursor.

A commitment to innovative coding practices (‚Äúvibe coding‚Äù) and continuous improvement of your development workflow.


Automation & Workflow Expertise ( n8n.io )



Hands-on experience building automation workflows using n8n.io (or Make/Copilot Studio).

Ability to enhance productivity and drive process improvements through well-designed automation solutions.


Database & API Skills



Solid experience working with standard databases (Redis, SQL/NoSQL).

Proficiency in retrieving, cleaning, transforming, and managing data via APIs for analytics and AI-driven applications.


Continuous Learner & Active Consumer of AI Content



You stay on top of the rapidly evolving AI landscape by actively consuming and engaging with content on platforms like X (Twitter), YouTube, and industry blogs.

Eagerness to translate new findings into actionable, real-world improvements.


Passion for AI‚Äôs Business Impact



A genuine excitement for the potential of AI to transform business processes.

Ability to quickly turn cutting-edge ideas into tangible, impactful solutions for internal operations and customer-facing products.

What We Can Offer You


A welcoming workplace full of drinks, snacks, friendly faces and fun team-building events
Access to unique discounts at high street retailers, hotels, and service providers, in addition to a 50% discount on all Lovehoney products to explore and discover new ways to have fun
Enjoy a hybrid work model that fosters flexibility and work-life balance, with three days per week in-office and the opportunity to work remotely for up to 4 weeks per year, alongside 25 days‚Äô holiday, plus an additional day for each year you are with Lovehoney, providing ample time for relaxation, rejuvenation, and exploration
Access to customised training opportunities to support your unique learning journey, complemented by biannual feedback cycles, offering valuable insights into your performance and growth areas, enhancing your development within the company.
Recognising the significance of physical and mental health, we proudly provide gym benefits in addition to a mental wellbeing platform, to ensure our employees thrive both professionally and personally.



Lovehoney Group is an equal opportunities employer. We promise that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage and civil partnership, pregnancy and maternity, race, religion or belief, sex, or sexual orientation.

If you require accommodations during the interview process due to a disability, please inform your Talent Acquisition Specialist so that we can ensure a smooth and inclusive experience for all candidates.

At Lovehoney Group, we leverage artificial intelligence as part of our screening interview process, for note-taking purposes. Rest assured, we prioritize transparency and respect candidates' preferences. You'll have the option to opt out while still receiving fair consideration for the role.

We currently have a hybrid work model supporting a blend of in-office and remote work (3 days per week in-office)

If we sparked your interest and you are open to embarking on your professional path with us, please visit our Lovehoney careers page to apply: https://jobs.eu.lever.co/lovehoneygroup

Our privacy policy is available here: https://www.lovehoneygroup.com/privacy-policy/

Title: Data Scientist, Traveler
Description:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, people from all over the world have booked more than 150 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 800 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team mission

At GetYourGuide (GYG), we're looking for a passionate Data Scientist to join our Traveler Data Products Team. In this role, you'll have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our product and our customers' experiences. You'll work with a vast and diverse set of structured and unstructured data, powering various data products such as search, recommendations, SEM, and incentives. Our team has touchpoints across the business, developing end-to-end solutions that directly contribute to creating memorable travel experiences for people around the world.

Join the Traveler Data Products Team, where we are passionate about creating data-driven solutions that empower travelers to discover and connect with the perfect experiences. Our mission is to make our vast inventory accessible and relevant by tailoring it to individual interests, extracting valuable insights from product descriptions, and customizing page layouts to meet our users' unique needs. We are also at the forefront of exploring how Large Language Models (LLMs) can accelerate the discovery of relevant products, ensuring a seamless and enriching customer journey.

As a valued member of our inclusive and dynamic team, you will collaborate closely with fellow Data Scientists and MLOps Engineers, continuously innovating to enhance the relevance and personalization of the products we display. Together, we strive to make every travel experience unforgettable.

You Will


Develop innovative data products that not only delight our customers but also drive the success of our company.
Take full ownership of projects, guiding them from the initial business challenge to the deployment of production code. This includes:
Contribute to the development of our machine learning infrastructure and help establish best practices that will shape our future.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, leveraging your unique perspective to solve complex and exciting problems.
Support the continuous improvement and growth of our team, including participating in recruiting efforts to bring in new talent.


Who You Are

Ideal candidates will have 2+ years experience in a full time role, covering most of the following areas:


Machine Learning Familiarity with regressors, classifiers, and recommender systems. A solid understanding of ML techniques and their practical applications. Experience deploying ML models in production is a plus.
Software Engineering Proficiency in Python. Knowledge of distributed machine learning and computing frameworks (e.g., Spark) is beneficial.
Analytics Ability to transform data into actionable insights. Experience with hypothesis testing and proficiency in analytics tools (e.g., pandas, R) and SQL.
Business Acumen Applied experience in a business environment, demonstrating result-driven work.
Academic Background An advanced degree in a quantitative field or equivalent practical experience.
Communication Strong skills in explaining complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.


We value potential and enthusiasm as much as experience. If you are passionate about data science and eager to learn, we encourage you to apply, even if you don't meet all the criteria listed above.

How We Set You Up For Success


Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences
A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
English-speaking office environment
Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
Well-stocked kitchen and team-building events like our famous pizza & beer Fridays
GetYourGuide vouchers and free German lessons
Save on transportation costs with discounted public transportation tickets
Support your loved ones with generous maternity and paternity leave policies
Relocation assistance if needed


And more...

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.

Title: Decision Scientist (Data Analyst), Vinted
Description:
Brief info about Vinted

Vinted Marketplace is the largest online international C2C marketplace in Europe dedicated to second-hand fashion, with millions of registered members spanning 20+ markets in Europe and North America. With a mission to make second-hand the first choice worldwide, Vinted enables people to sell and buy second-hand clothes and lifestyle items from each other, helping give those items a second or even third life.

Vinted Go launched in 2022, with a focus on developing products and solutions for more seamless shipping and delivery across Europe. Vinted Go has connected more than 40 carriers and more than 200,000 PUDO points across Europe to support the delivery of millions of parcels per year.

The Vinted Group, composed of Vinted Marketplace and Vinted Go, is headquartered in Vilnius, with workplaces in Germany, Lithuania, France, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and over 2,000 employees. It is backed by six leading venture capital firms: Accel, Burda Principal Investments, EQT Growth, Insight Partners, Lightspeed Venture Partners, and Sprints Capital.

Information about the position

As a Decision Scientist at Vinted, your work will have a tangible impact on the real world, empowering Vinted‚Äôs members to lead more sustainable lives. You will play a key role in shaping our product and business strategy by leveraging data to drive impactful decision-making.

Decision Scientists at Vinted are distributed across our family of domains: Strategy & Planning, Marketing, Member Lifecycle, Buyer, Seller, Pricing & Revenue, Purchase, Order, Payments, Trust & Safety, Security, Help Experience, Vinted Go OpsTech, Vinted Go Points, and Vinted Go Network, either embedded in cross-functional product teams or as part of data teams, collaborating closely with colleagues to identify opportunities, generate insights, and improve member experiences.

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, enjoys problem-solving, and is passionate about using data to drive meaningful change.

Our Decision Scientists work within the broader Data Science & Analytics (DSA) organisation, where we have three distinct roles. We believe that each role can make a similarly sized business impact in different ways, and therefore, our salary ranges are the same for all three roles. To understand your role within the DSA context better, here are brief descriptions of each role we have in the department:

Decision Scientists are responsible for actionable insights, identifying and sizing opportunities, and developing automated tools that increase the quality of product and business decisions by applying statistical methods and data-driven decision-making.

Data Scientists are responsible for identification of algorithmic opportunities, ensuring those opportunities are addressed in an optimal fashion and design, development and maintenance of production-grade statistical and machine learning algorithms.

Analytics Engineers are responsible for data curation ‚Äì translating data needs from stakeholders into architecting, building and maintaining efficient & reliable data models and pipelines.

As a Decision Scientist at Vinted, you‚Äôll:


Partner with your team and stakeholders at Vinted, to identify strategic opportunities and provide data-driven recommendations, as well as answer critical business questions.
Test and analyse developed opportunities to validate their value and understand their business impact, using statistical methods and visualisation tools
Select, calculate, and monitor your team's key performance indicators, proactively flagging issues, running analyses and understanding root causes
Enable your team and direct stakeholders to independently leverage data for business insights via self-service dashboards
Contribute to a data-driven culture by promoting best practices in analytics and decision-making to make data count.


About You


Experience in a Decision Science or Data Analytics role.
Good analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to balance depth of analysis with business impact.
Familiarity with SQL and Python
Experience with BI tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI)
Knowledge of statistical methods, such as A/B testing, regression analysis, and other inferential techniques.
Highly results-oriented and comfortable with iterative processes
Strong communicator who can convincingly present results to both technical and non-technical audiences
Fluent in English, both written and spoken


If you‚Äôre excited about this role but don‚Äôt meet every requirement, we still encourage you to apply. We have multiple positions available across our different domains - your unique experience and perspective could be exactly what we need!

Work perks


The opportunity to benefit from our share options programme
30 days of paid annual leave
Newest MacBook models
Mental and emotional health support through the Mindletic app
Home office support: we provide IT workstation equipment and a personal budget of up to ‚Ç¨540 for home workplace furniture
A daily lunch allowance
Frequent team-building events
A personal monthly budget for shopping on Vinted
A subsidised gym membership with ClassPass or Urban Sports Club
A subsidised pension plan provided by Vinted
Hallesche Supplemental health insurance
Life and disability insurance provided
A subsidised Deutschlandticket
The opportunity to spend up to 90 days per year - 21 of which can be spent working outside of the EU - on workation
A dog-friendly office


Working at Vinted

Individual Learning Budget

We invest in your professional growth! As part of our commitment to continuous learning, we offer an annual learning budget to support your personal and career development through courses, certifications, workshops and more.

Hybrid Work

We‚Äôve adopted a hybrid workplace model where 2 days in the office are recommended but not enforced. It‚Äôs up to you and your team to decide on the exact days you‚Äôll spend working together in person.

Equal Opportunity

The Vinted Group is committed to building an inclusive workplace where people from all walks of life feel a sense of belonging. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, identities and life experiences. At Vinted, all applicants are treated fairly without regard to their race, age, religion or belief, sex, national origin, citizenship, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic.

We are currently hiring both mid and senior level Decision Scientists with the base salary range between ‚Ç¨54,200 - ‚Ç¨94,300 gross per year.

It is backed by six leading venture capital firms: Accel, Burda Principal Investments, EQT Growth, Insight Partners, Lightspeed Venture Partners, and Sprints Capital.

Information about the position

As a Decision Scientist at Vinted, your work will have a tangible impact on the real world, empowering Vinted‚Äôs members to lead more sustainable lives. You will play a key role in shaping our product and business strategy by leveraging data to drive impactful decision-making.

Decision Scientists at Vinted are distributed across our family of domains: Strategy & Planning, Marketing, Member Lifecycle, Buyer, Seller, Pricing & Revenue, Purchase, Order, Payments, Trust & Safety, Security, Help Experience, Vinted Go OpsTech, Vinted Go Points, and Vinted Go Network, either embedded in cross-functional product teams or as part of data teams, collaborating closely with colleagues to identify opportunities, generate insights, and improve member experiences.

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, enjoys problem-solving, and is passionate about using data to drive meaningful change.

Our Decision Scientists work within the broader Data Science & Analytics (DSA) organisation, where we have three distinct roles. We believe that each role can make a similarly sized business impact in different ways, and therefore, our salary ranges are the same for all three roles. To understand your role within the DSA context better, here are brief descriptions of each role we have in the department:

Decision Scientists are responsible for actionable insights, identifying and sizing opportunities, and developing automated tools that increase the quality of product and business decisions by applying statistical methods and data-driven decision-making.

Data Scientists are responsible for identification of algorithmic opportunities, ensuring those opportunities are addressed in an optimal fashion and design, development and maintenance of production-grade statistical and machine learning algorithms.

Analytics Engineers are responsible for data curation ‚Äì translating data needs from stakeholders into architecting, building and maintaining efficient & reliable data models and pipelines.

As a Decision Scientist at Vinted, you‚Äôll:

  • Partner with your team and stakeholders at Vinted, to identify strategic opportunities and provide data-driven recommendations, as well as answer critical business questions.
  • Test and analyse developed opportunities to validate their value and understand their business impact, using statistical methods and visualisation tools
  • Select, calculate, and monitor your team's key performance indicators, proactively flagging issues, running analyses and understanding root causes
  • Enable your team and direct stakeholders to independently leverage data for business insights via self-service dashboards
  • Contribute to a data-driven culture by promoting best practices in analytics and decision-making to make data count.

About You

  • Experience in a Decision Science or Data Analytics role.
  • Good analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to balance depth of analysis with business impact.
  • Familiarity with SQL and Python
  • Experience with BI tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI)
  • Knowledge of statistical methods, such as A/B testing, regression analysis, and other inferential techniques.
  • Highly results-oriented and comfortable with iterative processes
  • Strong communicator who can convincingly present results to both technical and non-technical audiences
  • Fluent in English, both written and spoken

If you‚Äôre excited about this role but don‚Äôt meet every requirement, we still encourage you to apply. We have multiple positions available across our different domains - your unique experience and perspective could be exactly what we need!

Work perks

  • The opportunity to benefit from our share options programme
  • 30 days of paid annual leave
  • Newest MacBook models
  • Mental and emotional health support through the Mindletic app
  • Home office support: we provide IT workstation equipment and a personal budget of up to ‚Ç¨540 for home workplace furniture
  • A daily lunch allowance
  • Frequent team-building events
  • A personal monthly budget for shopping on Vinted
  • A subsidised gym membership with ClassPass or Urban Sports Club
  • A subsidised pension plan provided by Vinted
  • Hallesche Supplemental health insurance
  • Life and disability insurance provided
  • A subsidised Deutschlandticket
  • The opportunity to spend up to 90 days per year - 21 of which can be spent working outside of the EU - on workation
  • A dog-friendly office

Working at Vinted

Individual Learning Budget

We invest in your professional growth! As part of our commitment to continuous learning, we offer an annual learning budget to support your personal and career development through courses, certifications, workshops and more.

Hybrid Work

We‚Äôve adopted a hybrid workplace model where 2 days in the office are recommended but not enforced. It‚Äôs up to you and your team to decide on the exact days you‚Äôll spend working together in person.

Equal Opportunity

The Vinted Group is committed to building an inclusive workplace where people from all walks of life feel a sense of belonging. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, identities and life experiences. At Vinted, all applicants are treated fairly without regard to their race, age, religion or belief, sex, national origin, citizenship, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic.

We are currently hiring both mid and senior level Decision Scientists with the base salary range between ‚Ç¨54,200 - ‚Ç¨94,300 gross per year.

Title: Senior Data Scientist - AI Agents & Generative AI (f/m/d)*
Description:
Your Mission

As a Senior Data Scientist (f/m/d)*, you will evaluate and improve the performance of our AI Agents. This will involve developing evaluation tasks for agent behaviour, fine-tuning foundation models, researching and prototyping new AI Agent features and frameworks, and investigating issues affecting our customers. You‚Äôll develop a deep understanding of the behaviour of our models and AI Agents. You‚Äôll work directly with product engineering and sales teams, leading by example on evaluating and improving our product - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tuning STT models on new languages and accents.

You‚Äôll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa‚Äôs ML Evaluation Platform and the machine learning models that power our product. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will


Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
Develop and evaluate production Agentic AI systems for real customer use cases
Directly support and collaborate with product engineering and sales, analyzing the performance of our AI products and prototyping new features
Evaluate and train or fine-tune a variety of models, including LLMs, intent classification, STT, and TTS models
Execute Machine Learning research and development projects end-to-end, rapidly turning new ideas into customer facing features


Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table


7+ years of experience as a Data Scientist
Experience developing and owning production ML models and systems. Experience with LLMs, NLP, or information retrieval is a strong plus
Strong proficiency in Python and experience with using using Python in production
Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
Strong spoken and written communication skills in English


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?


Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
Attractive compensation package
Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity


Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call ‚Üí Hiring Manager Interview ‚Üí Technical Stage 1 (Data Science Coding Session) ‚Üí Technical Stage 2 (Machine Learning Theory & Case Study) ‚Üí Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa‚Äôs voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that‚Äôs revolutionizing an entire industry. We‚Äôre passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we‚Äôre expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.


We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.
